channel.title: Argon OSRS - Released
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i61.tinypic.com/35lc9hi.png[/img]
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52228169/splash.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52228169/Website-image-big.gif/[/img]
[FONT=Arial Black]Argon's Owners[/FONT] Arham (ImNewMem/System)
Information Argon is Project Instanity based server using Eliminates v0.7 OSRS build.
Content Added 19.7.2014 Added all OSRS item models. 19.7.2014 Added proper server configuration. 19.7.2014 Player's cannot drop items over 1m without getting a dialogue asking is the player sure. 20.7.2014 Quest tab updates (basically a information tab) 20.7.2014 A lot better combat system + corrected combat timers 21.7.2014 Added item destroying to untradeable items. 22.7.2014 If item is over 1 million gold coins there will be a dialogue asking are you sure you want to drop the item. 23.7.2014 Added almost all OSRS models. 24.7.2014 Skill tab updates 24.7.2014 Started 'Battle Task' system will give info soon about it. 24.7.2014 Combo foods (cooked karambwan and such) 24.7.2014 Added RS prayer training method: Book of binding (vial enchanting) Official -Added bonus EXP system.
Item interactions -Casket looting -Bones on Altar
Media
DFS Creation
Video: [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RreUKTR8zTM]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RreUKTR8zTM[/url]

item.title: Argon OSRS - Released
item.dc:creator: @ArgonRSPS ArgonRSPS
item.description:
@ArgonRSPS wrote:

[CENTER]


[FONT=Arial Black]Argon’s Owners[/FONT]
Arham (ImNewMem/System)

Information
Argon is Project Instanity based server using Eliminates v0.7 OSRS build.

Content Added
19.7.2014 Added all OSRS item models.
19.7.2014 Added proper server configuration.
19.7.2014 Player’s cannot drop items over 1m without getting a dialogue asking is the player sure.
20.7.2014 Quest tab updates (basically a information tab)
20.7.2014 A lot better combat system + corrected combat timers
21.7.2014 Added item destroying to untradeable items.
22.7.2014 If item is over 1 million gold coins there will be a dialogue asking are you sure you want to drop the item.
23.7.2014 Added almost all OSRS models.
24.7.2014 Skill tab updates
24.7.2014 Started ‘Battle Task’ system will give info soon about it.
24.7.2014 Combo foods (cooked karambwan and such)
24.7.2014 Added RS prayer training method: Book of binding (vial enchanting)
Official
-Added bonus EXP system.

Item interactions
-Casket looting
-Bones on Altar

Media

DFS Creation

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RreUKTR8zTM

How to switch spell books:

Tele-Tabs working

Custom Nightmare Zone



Quick-Chat working

Slayer + Duo Slayer

Bounty Hunter working

World-Wide Teleports

Random Events




Construction Skill working!

Pets working!

Perk System



Videos:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_ke_1m2GCU
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IXX89sTn4xM
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YzMYRP5muXg
